page.title: 14CLUBS IN GRAFFHAM
page.content: The badminton club has a court & you have to be 16 years to join. You play in doubles & change paretners for each game & so gain experience. You break for refreshments. The youth club began 15 years ago. You buy sweets & drinks. 53 children go, 25 seniors & 28 juniors. They go ice-skating & to the cinema. The football club began in 1919, by kicking an inflated pig's bladder around & then they joined a league. They train on Wednesdays & play on Saturdays. They have an annual dinner & dance, & play in black & white. Thus the village is very active & there should be a club to suit everyone. For example other clubs are tennis, bowls, weaving, amateur dramatics to only name a few.
